title: Round Typewriter/Slab Serif
author: jeanly

comments.content: It looks like **[ITC American Typewriter Condensed Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114705/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC&ffam=ITC%20American%20Typewriter%20LT%20Cond%20-%20Bold&fid=7c0cb3fcef594f5760e9136549b0e7f4&fsize=60&text=HOW%20TO%20%26%20NOT%20TO&wrap=2)**
It's slightly more condensed and the kerning is different from a typewriter font. Any ideas?
